summary: Deployment approved; current build includes profile persistence and updated login behavior (Draft Version 36).

existing_features.title: Deploy the current approved build (Draft Version 36) to production as an Internet Computer canister upgrade, without making further feature/code changes.

After production deployment, perform a basic smoke test of the critical flows mentioned in the latest iteration: Internet Identity login/logout behavior and user profile persistence across refresh/relogin.

projectName: Deploy approved Draft Version 36 to production
